attributes.action: Cancel the funding to train Imams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a Christian country, it is completely ridiculous that the entire country is now paying to train Imams who represent only around 2-3% of the population.  The people who sign this petition demand that this funding is stopped immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
